translation.en: [chuckles] Show me the tummy!
-Good boy, Pugsley! -[whimpers]
[Barney] Come on, boy. Let's go.
[woman on TV] Oh, it's Grandpa!
[gasps] Is he dead?
[man on TV] No, miss, he's just… frozen.
[woman] At his own birthday party too.
translation.ko: - 굳어버린 거예요 - 생일 파티에서도 그러셨어요 "사람 구함"

translation.en: -"His big special day." -[woman] His big special day.
[man] And he seemed so happy in the photographs.
Wait, that's it.
Photographs capture the soul of the subject.
The only question is, how are we gonna get Grandpa…
translation.ko: 이제 할아버지를 다시 할아버지로 돌아오게 할

translation.en: -[sinister music playing] -…back in Grandpa!
Okay, Mom. Ask me what my biggest weakness is.
translation.ko: 좋아요, 엄마 제 최대 약점이 뭔지 물어보세요

translation.en: Oily skin?
I'm serious.
I was gonna go with something like "paralyzing fear of confrontation."
translation.ko: '갈등의 공포 앞에 무력해지는 것' 이라고 하려고 했는데

translation.en: Uh, sweetie, why do you wanna know your biggest weakness?
My job interview at Phoenix Parks.
Tonight. I told you.
Uh, but Grammy Gram's coming for dinner. I made cheese-less mac and cheese.
translation.ko: 오늘 외할머니 식사하러 오시잖아 치즈 없는 맥앤치즈 만들었는데

translation.en: Ugh, Mom, did you tell her I would be there?
Yeah, of course.
Did you tell her Barney would be there?
Oh, come on, sweetie, there's a lot she doesn't understand.
translation.ko: 알잖아, 할머니는 이해 못 하시는 게 많아

translation.en: [scoffs] She's not the only one.
-[whimpers] -[chuckles] Sorry, buddy, you can't come.
translation.ko: 미안해, 친구 넌 같이 못 가

translation.en: But if I get this job, we can get a place of our own.
translation.ko: 하지만 여기에 취직하면 우리만의 공간이 생겨

translation.en: Just you and me. No Mom, no Dad, [scoffs] no Grammy Gram.
translation.ko: 우리만의 공간 엄마, 아빠도 없고 할머니도 없지

translation.en: Okay, fine. Come on.
[laughs] Oh, stop it.
Oh, my precious girl!
Going to her first job interview!
-[sniffling] -Mom!
Call me before you go in.
And after. And maybe during too?
translation.ko: 들어가기 전에 전화해 끝나고 나와서도 면접 중에 해도 돼

translation.en: [chuckling] Bye, Mom.
[over phone] Just checking you've got your phone.
If you whizz in my bag again, I'm sending you right back home, young man.
translation.ko: 내 가방에 또 오줌 싸면 집으로 보낼 거야

translation.en: [Norma] Oh, jeez. Strange dude. Talking to himself.
Okay, maybe Mom was right and I should never go outside.
translation.ko: 엄마 말 들을걸 밖에 나오는 게 아니었어

translation.en: Or at least I think that's what she was trying to say.
translation.ko: 적어도 내 귀에는 나가지 말란 소리로 들렸어

translation.en: Uh… You're the one talking to yourself, Norma. [grunting] How do you know my name?
translation.ko: - 혼잣말하는 건 너야, 노마 - 내 이름을 어떻게 알아?

translation.en: -Whoa! It's me, Barney. -Uh, I'm bad with names.
translation.ko: - 나야, 바니 - 난 이름 잘 기억 못 해

translation.en: We literally live on the same street. Same school. We're lab partners!
translation.ko: 한동네에 살고 같은 학교잖아 우리 실험 짝꿍이야

translation.en: I'm bad with… faces.
translation.ko: 난 잘 기억 못 해 얼굴도!

translation.en: Hello, I'm Pauline Phoenix.
You know, in just a few ticks, we'll be at my very own theme park.
Thank you. Where the fun just never stops, except November through to March.
translation.ko: 고마워요 즐거움이 끊이지 않는 곳이죠 11월에서 3월까지만 빼고요

translation.en: We've got five zones for you all to enjoy, based on my movies, music and TV shows.
translation.ko: 모두가 즐길 수 있는 5개의 구역이 있어요 제 영화, 음악, TV 쇼를 바탕으로 하고 있죠

translation.en: Remember, consuming outside food and drink is a big no-no.
translation.ko: 명심해요, 외부 음식과 음료는 절대 먹어선 안 돼요

translation.en: And if you see anything that seems just a little outta sorts, you know, anything suspicious or supernatural at all,
translation.ko: 뭔가 찝찝하거나 의심스럽고 초자연적인 현상을 보면

translation.en: [chuckling] well, just keep it to yourself, darlin'.
-Did you see that? -Yeah, we're almost there.
[Pauline over speakers] Thank you for visiting Phoenix Parks.
-[breathes deeply] -[Pauline] Y'all enjoy yourselves! Or else.
translation.ko: 신나게 즐기지 않으면 가만 안 둬요

translation.en: I hope y'all come back soon.
Safe trip. Take care now. Don't sue. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 곧 다시 만나요, 조심히 가요 건강히 지내요 고소하지 말고요

translation.en: Okay, you can stop following me now, creep.
I'm not following you. And I'm not a creep.
translation.ko: 너 따라가는 거 아니고 스토커도 아니야

translation.en: -I've got a job interview down here. -Wait.
"Opportunity at Phoenix Parks, Dead End Attraction."
translation.ko: '피닉스 파크에서 일할 기회 데드 엔드 귀신의 집'

translation.en: "Please arrive at sundown."
[both] "Rare opening for the one perfect candidate."
-Well, good luck. -Thanks!
Wait!
-Okay. You ready, boy? -[barks]
Torpe-dog!
-[barks] -Good boy.
[gasps] What?
-How did that happen? -I took the staff line.
translation.ko: 뭐야, 어떻게 된 거야? 직원 전용 길로 왔어

translation.en: Oh, my ghosts! This is so cool.
translation.ko: 오, 세상에 짜릿해! 여기 진짜 끝내준다

translation.en: No one's been in here for a year. Not since the Jennifer Swan incident.
translation.ko: 여기 1년간 폐쇄됐었어 - 제니퍼 스완 사건 이후로 - 제니퍼 스완?

translation.en: Jennifer Swan?
translation.ko: - 제니퍼 스완 사건 이후로 - 제니퍼 스완?

translation.en: It was on a night like tonight. Except it was raining.
translation.ko: 오늘 같은 밤이었지 비 오는 것만 빼고

translation.en: And I think it was a Thursday morning, actually.
One of the parks' Pauline impersonators entered Dead End…
translation.ko: 폴린 분장을 한 연기자가 데드 엔드에 들어갔어

translation.en: -[sinister music playing] -…and never came out!
She died? In here?
Whoa! No, I just said she didn't come out.
She just "disappeared."
-I can't believe you didn't know. -[sniffing] [Barney] All right.
Don't you know anything about Dead End? I'm clearly the better candidate for this job.
translation.ko: 데드 엔드에 관해 아는 게 없네 내가 너보다 유리해

translation.en: That stuff doesn't matter. It's about being a responsible employee.
translation.ko: 그건 중요하지 않아 직원에게 중요한 건 책임감이지

translation.en: Your dog is whizzing on the furniture. [gasps] Pugs… Pugsley! No!
translation.ko: - 네 개가 가구에 오줌 싼다 - 퍽슬리, 안 돼

translation.en: [Norma] Go on. Ask me anything.
Uh, how do you get dog pee out of cobwebs?
About Pauline! Dead End. This park.
translation.ko: 폴린에 관해서 말이야! 데드 엔드랑 이 테마파크!

translation.en: I know everything. Every cast member. Every episode.
translation.ko: 난 다 알아 모든 출연진, 에피소드

translation.en: Every single nut and bolt of this whole darn attraction.
Who's that?
[chuckles] Easy, that's old Charlie Bonaparte.
-Full name Charles… -[yelps]
Welcome, mortals.
[Pauline over speakers] Your beautiful photograph is ready to collect.
[Norma] …at the full moon. AKA, he's a werewolf.
translation.ko: 보름달이 뜨면 변신하지 일명, 늑대 인간이야

translation.en: Although, they didn't establish that… Are you even listening?
translation.ko: 근데 확실히 밝혀지진 않았… 듣고 있는 거야?

translation.en: Sitting around on the job? Glad I'm not his boss. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 농땡이 부린대요! 쟤 상사가 아니길 망정이지

translation.en: Oh, hi. I'm Norma Khan. I'm here for the job opportunity…
translation.ko: 안녕하세요, 노마 칸이에요 면접 보러 왔어요

translation.en: [pants] Hi. And I'm Barney.
And you must be the manager. Love the costume.
And you two must be the offerings. I didn't know there'd be a choice.
translation.ko: 너희는 제물이지 선택해야 할 줄은 몰랐네

translation.en: There isn't. Uh, here's my resume, references…
translation.ko: 선택할 것도 없어요 제 이력서랑 증빙 서류예요

translation.en: [Norma] …and proof of visits to Dead End… -[yawns] -[Norma] …ages seven through 15.
And if that doesn't convince you,
translation.ko: 그래도 못 미더우시면 이 추천서를 보세요

translation.en: take a look at this letter from the very desk of Pauline's
translation.ko: 그래도 못 미더우시면 이 추천서를 보세요 이 추천서를 써준 건 폴린 피닉스의…

translation.en: [hesitates] secretary's intern.
translation.ko: 이 추천서를 써준 건 폴린 피닉스의… 비서 인턴이에요

translation.en: -Who's Pauline Phoenix? -[gasps]
And what about you, freckles?
What makes you think you'd be a good flesh vessel?
Perfect. Let's go.
What? Uh, no fair!
All right, folks, get ready. He's on his way.
translation.ko: 자, 다들 준비해 그분이 오고 계셔

translation.en: Um, Norma? I don't think this is what we think it is.
translation.ko: 노마, 우리가 생각하는 게 아닌 것 같아

translation.en: Ugh! I know! Group interview. They could've warned us.
translation.ko: 알아, 그룹 면접이네 미리 얘기 좀 해주지

translation.en: Uh, excuse me! Does this job have any benefits?
Uh, wings, blood made of fire, immortality.
-[Norma] Okay, but what about dental? -[elevator thuds]
-[screams] Norma? Norma! -Excuse me? I'm talking to you.
-You haven't answered my question. -Look! Do you mind?
translation.ko: 제 질문에 대답 안 하셨어요 얘기 중이잖아

translation.en: Here he comes! [laughs] The demon king's gonna love me for bringing two humans.
translation.ko: 오신다! 인간을 둘이나 데려왔으니 마왕님의 사랑을 받을 거야

translation.en: Demon king? What episode was that in?
This one!
O great Temeluchus. It must be Two for Tuesday!
translation.ko: 위대한 테메루커스 님 화요일엔 화끈하게 둘이죠

translation.en: [chuckles] I got you not one, but two flesh vessels.
I rescind my application. The job's yours!
They'd both make excellent new bodies, Temeluchus.
translation.ko: 둘 다 훌륭한 새 몸입니다 테메루커스 님

translation.en: -Which shall it be? -[growls]
Ip dip doo, the dog's got the flu,
the cat's got the chicken pox, so it's gonna be you!
Good choice. Fleshy.
[distorted] Pugsley!
Fellow demons, let us join hands, claws, tentacles.
translation.ko: 악마 친구들아, 손을 잡자 집게발, 촉수도

translation.en: ♪ Seal the body up Seal the body up ♪
♪ Pull, pull, smash, smash, smash! ♪
Pugsley?
Oh, no! Pugsley!
Pugsley, come on, buddy! Open your eyes. Pugsley, please.
translation.ko: 안 돼, 퍽슬리, 정신 차려! 눈 떠 퍽슬리? 제발!

translation.en: Do not give orders to the great Temeluchus!
Tremble, for Temeluchus lives again.
I specifically requested no photographs. Yeah. Uh, sorry about that.
translation.ko: - 사진은 안 된다고 했을 텐데 - 네, 죄송합니다

translation.en: But, uh, I was wondering,
translation.ko: 여쭤볼 게 있는데 제가 훌륭한 육신 둘을 바쳐

translation.en: since I provided two excellent vessels and fulfilled my side of the bargain,
translation.ko: 여쭤볼 게 있는데 제가 훌륭한 육신 둘을 바쳐 제 책임을 다했으니

translation.en: you could lift my curse and let me go back home?
translation.ko: 제 저주를 풀고 집에 보내 주시겠어요?

translation.en: Hmm. No!
I was specific.
Humans, tell me. Who is the king of this realm?
translation.ko: 인간들아, 말하라 이 세계의 왕이 누구인가?

translation.en: -We don't have a king. -Your ruler. Your commander.
translation.ko: 우린 왕 없어요 너희의 통치자, 대장 말이다

translation.en: I would very much like to eat them.
Oh, well, there's a little White House about 2,000 miles that way.
translation.ko: 저쪽으로 3천 km쯤 가면 하얀 집이 있어요

translation.en: Enough! I shall find and claim my own throne.
translation.ko: 됐다, 내가 직접 찾아 왕좌에 오르겠다

translation.en: Oh, no. Wait, sire. Wait, sire! Sire, wait.
Ooh, what about me, please? What about me?
[cries] I just wanna go home.
Norma, who are you calling? The dog pound?
translation.ko: 노마, 어디에 전화하는 거야? 유기견 보호소?

translation.en: No, my mom. She can take us home.
translation.ko: 아니, 우리 엄마 우릴 데리러 오실 거야

translation.en: My dog is possessed by Temeluka… Teme…Temeloo…
translation.ko: 내 강아지가 사로잡혔어, 테메루… 테메… 테메루… 악마한테!

translation.en: -Uh, a demon! -Yeah. It possessed your dog, not us.
translation.ko: 테메… 테메루… 악마한테! 그래, 우리가 아니라 네 강아지가 기회 있을 때 도망가자

translation.en: -So let's escape while we still can. -[line ringing]
translation.ko: 그래, 우리가 아니라 네 강아지가 기회 있을 때 도망가자

translation.en: Pugsley's not just my dog. He's my family.
translation.ko: 퍽슬리는 그냥 강아지가 아니라 내 가족이야

translation.en: The only family that's always had my back. And I can't lose him.
translation.ko: 늘 내 편인 유일한 가족 이대로 잃을 순 없어

translation.en: [Swati over phone] Sweetie, how did it go? Did you get it?
-Oh, no, you didn't get it, did you? -[Barney] Pugsley! Pugsley!
[Swati] Did you want me to come and have a word with them, maybe? -I will, my little blossom-- -Hmm.
translation.ko: 엄마가 가서 얘기해 볼까? 만약에 우리 딸이…

translation.en: What would Pauline do?
She'd save the dog and the park from any potential lawsuits.
translation.ko: 강아지와 테마파크를 구했을 거야 소송당하지 않도록

translation.en: -You! -Hi, hello. Yeah, Courtney. How ya doin'?
How do we stop it?
[chuckles] You can't stop Temeluchus. He's already dead.
translation.ko: 테메루커스 님은 못 막아 이미 죽었거든

translation.en: Which is why he needs a new vessel every few hundred years.
translation.ko: 그래서 몇백 년마다 새로운 육신이 필요하지

translation.en: So what are we talking? Salt circle? Holy water? Vacuum cleaner?
translation.ko: 그럼 소금 원이나 성수를 써야 해? - 진공청소기? - 내가 주문을 봉인했어

translation.en: Ugh! Well, I did the sealing spell.
Temeluchus' soul is now in that dog for good.
translation.ko: 테메루커스 님의 영혼은 영원히 저 개 안에 계실 거야

translation.en: The only way to stop him is to kill the dog!
translation.ko: 그분을 막으려면 그 개를 죽여야 해!

translation.en: That's not gonna happen.
Or find some other vessel for him to possess.
But the first option is way more fun.
I specifically requested no photographs.
Photographs capture the soul of the subject.
[panting] Pugsley! [panting] Pugs?
Throne.
He's looking for a throne! Yes! To Camelot! [pants]
translation.ko: 왕좌, 놈은 왕좌를 찾고 있어 그래, 카멜롯으로 가자!

translation.en: Have you come to challenge me?
No, I don't wanna fight you, Pugsley.
translation.ko: - 아니, 너와 싸우기 싫어, 퍽슬리 - 날 그렇게 부르지 마!

translation.en: Stop calling me that. Kneel before Temeluchus!
translation.ko: - 아니, 너와 싸우기 싫어, 퍽슬리 - 날 그렇게 부르지 마! 테메루커스 님 앞에 무릎을 꿇어라

translation.en: There's a good boy. You know, your body was my first choice.
translation.ko: 옳지, 너도 알다시피 처음에 난 네 몸을 골랐어

translation.en: Perhaps once I've exhausted this mighty vessel,
translation.ko: 내가 이 강력한 육신을 다 쓰면

translation.en: I'll move on to your strangely unwrinkled form.
translation.ko: 이상하게 주름 하나 없는 네 몸으로 옮겨가 주지

translation.en: I've had many bodies over the years.
translation.ko: 난 아주 오랫동안 많은 몸을 차지했다

translation.en: -This isn't even my first canine… -Psst. You need to take a photo.
translation.ko: - 개의 몸이 처음은 아니야 - 사진을 찍어

translation.en: Yeah, Norma, I think I'll remember this moment. My parents met during the Haunted Wars…
translation.ko: - 이 순간은 절대 못 잊지 - 우리 부모님은 헌티드 전쟁에서…

translation.en: No! Photos capture the soul. You know, like in Episode 105,
in which Pauline finds the body of her grandfather petrified on the floor -after his birthday party. -Yeah, I get it.
translation.ko: 폴린이 굳어서 누워 있는 할아버지를 발견한 얘기

translation.en: Just take the photo.
[groans] But my mom says my phone is for emergencies only.
-What do you call this? -Okay, okay.
-[Temeluchus speaking indistinctly] -[Norma] Say cheese!
-[cell phone ringing] -No, no, no, no, no.
No photos!
This is what I think of your pathetic toys. [laughs]
Yeah? Well, I was due an upgrade anyway!
[Temeluchus] Fool. You think you can outsmart me?
translation.ko: 멍청한 것 날 속일 수 있을 것 같아?

translation.en: Now it is your turn to be crushed to pieces!
Quick! Get in the log!
If you want me, come and get me!
[yelps] Norma! Help!
I've got a plan! Just keep him busy till we get to the drop!
Oh, don't worry, he's busy!
[laughs] Nice try.
Get down!
Wow.
[gasps] Pugsley's fighting back from the inside.
What did you just do to me? Some tricksy spell?
translation.ko: 방금 무슨 짓을 한 거야? 교활한 주문인가?

translation.en: Pugsley, sit!
[groans] Witches? I knew it!
[Norma] Doggie!
-Huh? -Fetch!
[splutters] I know your plan! -And it won't work! -[groans]
translation.ko: 너희 꿍꿍이 다 알아 어림도 없다!

translation.en: Norma!
Any last words?
[grunts] Show me the tummy!
-[laughs] Oh, no! -Who's a good boy? -[Temeluchus laughs] -Who's a good boy?
-Oh! No! No! No, no! [laughing] -Let me get that. Who's a good boy?
-Come on, Norma! -[grunting] Trying!
-[laughing] No! No! -That's it. Show me the tummy.
-[grunts] -Happy puppy. Good boy. Norma. Norma, now!
[Barney] Pugsley?
Pugsley, wake up. [crying]
Pugsley, wake up. [sniffles]
Wake up.
[gasps] Pugsley? Pugsley! You're alive?
[laughs] Pugsley! Oh!
Thank you, Norma. You didn't have to help us.
translation.ko: 고마워, 노마 - 위험을 무릅쓰고 도와줬잖아 - 아냐, 폴린 때문에 한 거야

translation.en: Oh, no. I did it for Pauline.
translation.ko: - 위험을 무릅쓰고 도와줬잖아 - 아냐, 폴린 때문에 한 거야

translation.en: [Pauline over speakers] Your beautiful photograph is ready to collect.
-[whimpers] -Don't worry, buddy. It's all over now. There's still one more thing for us to do.
translation.ko: - 걱정 마, 이제 다 끝났어 - 아직 해야 할 일이 하나 남았어

translation.en: [Courtney] Ugh! Let me in!
Wait. You guys are alive? What happened to Temeluchus?
translation.ko: 잠깐, 너희 안 죽었어? 테메루커스 님은 어떻게 됐어?

translation.en: Oh, he had a great time in the park. And made lots of memories.
translation.ko: - 아주 즐거운 시간을 보냈지 - 추억도 많이 만들었고

translation.en: [screams] How am I ever gonna get myself un-banished now?
You know, I'm glad we're alive but, uh, I still really wanted that job.
translation.ko: 살아남아서 다행이야 근데 난 아직도 여기서 일하고 싶어

translation.en: Yeah, me too. Guess I'll just spend another 15 years hyper-fixating on something else.
translation.ko: 나도, 앞으로 15년간 다른 거에 과잉 집착 하면서 살아야지

translation.en: Wait, wait! Wait! Humans. [chuckles] What do you want now?
Don't you wanna know who got the job?
translation.ko: - 누가 합격했는지 알려줄까? - 우릴 속인 거잖아

translation.en: You tricked us. There is no job.
translation.ko: - 누가 합격했는지 알려줄까? - 우릴 속인 거잖아 - 일자리는 없어 - 여긴 언제나 일자리가 있어

translation.en: In this place, there's always a job going. [chuckles]
translation.ko: - 일자리는 없어 - 여긴 언제나 일자리가 있어

translation.en: I tend to scare away most security guards. Put these on and you'll blend right in.
translation.ko: 내가 안전 요원들을 겁줘서 쫓아내거든 이거 입어, 직원처럼 보일 거야

translation.en: You guys are like demon-buster extraordinaires. I need you guys around.
translation.ko: 너희는 악마 쫓는 능력이 탁월해 나한텐 너희가 필요해

translation.en: Wouldn't we be the last people you'd want hanging around?
translation.ko: 그럼 우리를 싫어해야 하는 거 아니야?

translation.en: Not all demons are as friendly and forgiving as I am.
translation.ko: 모든 악마가 나처럼 친절하고 너그러운 게 아니야 "통나무 기사 후룸라이드"

translation.en: After what happened today, I feel I'm gonna need a lot of security around.
translation.ko: 오늘 일 때문에 안전 요원이 더 많이 필요할 것 같아

translation.en: So what do you say?
-Well, to be honest… -[squeals] I got the job! -I got it! [laughs] -[Swati laughing over phone]
I'll be right over to pick you up!
-There's going to be a big party tonight. -Psst. Norma. -Ma, wait. See you in a minute. -Oh, I'm so--
Do you think we can trust her?
Hmm. Well, she is a demon.
I try not to judge people on appearance.
And she did try to sacrifice us.
Or experience. Or deep-seated gut instincts.
translation.ko: - 우리를 제물로 바치려 했어 - 경험으로도 깊은 내면의 직감으로도

translation.en: Anyhow, Mom's coming to pick me up for celebration tacos.
translation.ko: 아무튼, 엄마 오면 타코집으로 축하 파티 하러 갈 거야

translation.en: [chuckles] Uh, wanna come with me, Barney? Hey! You remembered my name.
translation.ko: - 같이 갈래, 바니? - 내 이름 기억하네!

translation.en: Don't make it weird. Uh, so what do you say?
translation.ko: 호들갑 떨지 마, 그래서 갈 거야?

translation.en: My whole family's going out for dinner. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 우리 가족 다 올 거야 우리 할머니도

translation.en: Even my grandma. Uh, wanna come?
translation.ko: 우리 가족 다 올 거야 우리 할머니도 같이 갈래?

translation.en: Well, I'm gonna stick around here for just a little bit.
translation.ko: 글쎄, 난 여기 좀 더 있을래

translation.en: Maybe get a shift in right away. For the overtime.
translation.ko: 바로 투입될지도 모르잖아 시간 외 근무

translation.en: -You have fun, partner. -[gasps]
Don't suppose this place has any bedrooms?
Whoa!
So, my liege… [chuckles nervously]
Sorry about that. No, uh… No hard feelings.
Hmm. There's a bit of you missing.
Where did that go?
[Barney] Ah, it's perfect. For tonight, at least.
Oh, how thoughtless of me. Here you go.
translation.ko: 아이고, 너무 내 생각만 했네 여기 있어

translation.en: Ah! A place of our own. Just like I said.
[yawns] Night-night, Pugsley.
[Pugsley] Night-night, Barney.
